channel.title: Wont let me run server...Please help
channel.description:
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) Exception in thread "main"
when ever i start up server its tell me this^... this happened when i changed my ip to static and port forwarded the static ip, i made sure none of the ips were the same... and this still happen

item.title: Wont let me run server...Please help
